message:
Ex Machina is a must-watch Sci-Fi movie if u r interested in AI and Humanoid robots ... 

If u already watched it .. what do u think of discussing the availability of converting that fiction into reality ?

**There is a bit of nudity in the movie ... kindly .. please lower your gaze when it appear 3:) . I will never like to recommend something and carry a dhanb over my shoulder because of it . <3

#repost after some edits :D !
story: Osama Soliman shared a Page to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Ex Machina

data.message: I watched it yesterday , I think it sucks o. Story and acting levels, it works on the technical level tho.

Let me put it this way, I gave it a one star rating on imdb.com. I gave it one star because I can't give it any less!

The movie has no story, no plot, and certainly a very cheap idea!
This is probably one of the worst movies made in history
I was planning to watch that movie ... should I cancel that plan? :D
Hassan Aly Selim Trust me, it doesn't worth your time. Those are 2 hours I am never getting back
yes it's a waste of time, the movie is really bad

ok 7'alas, plan cancelled :D
I don't watch a lot of movies anyways :D

I'm surprised by all the negative reviews of the film. I thought it was absolutely amazing. My only problems with the movie are the pace and the excessive nudity at the end. But it talks about something that will become very relevant in the future. It's not got a lot of ground in reality when it comes to tech, but it is definitely spot on when it comes to the ethical side of things.

Guys as I mentioned .. this film will be interesting only for AI developers and guys who spent their childhood watching Astro body :D ... yet all I wanted from this post is your imaginations about converting such a fiction into reality !! 
everyone go deep in his brain , remember something he just watched in the movie ... and tell us how we will convert it to be real :) !

I just wanted to say that I'm very glad that I watched this movide today!
You can't imagine the amount of philosophical discussions I had with myself and with a friend after I watched this movie, we talked about AI, self-awareness, the uncanny valley, the soul, religions, free will, randomness vs determinism, the purpose of life, and other crazy ideas.
I love movies and shows that make me have these kinds of discussions :)
Hassan Aly Selim  I will watch it based on ur review :)
